game.name: Song Of The Prairie
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Song of The Prairie는 3D 편안한 농장 게임입니다. 악마를 물리친 영웅이 새로운 전원생활을 시작한다. 마을 탐험의 재미를 경험하십시오. 거대한 과일과 작물을 수확합니다. 환상적인 동물을 돌보고 있습니다. 좋아하는 사람과 데이트하기. 나만의 농사생활을 즐겨보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Song of The Prairie is a 3D relaxing farm game. A hero who defeat the demon begins a new rural life. Experiencing the fun of exploration to the town. Harvesting giant fruits and crops. Taking care fantastic animals. Dating with someone you like. Just enjoy the farming life only belongs to you!
